vault.noDataOrInvalidKey: No encrypted data found to decrypt or Key Invalid.

identity.title: Digital Identity
identity.description: Manage your cryptographic identity and verified contacts.
identity.noIdentity: No identity detected. Generate a secure RSA keypair to create your Access Card.
identity.noContacts: No contacts verified. Import an Identity Card to begin secure comms.
identity.name: Name
identity.importFailed: Failed to read Identity Card. Make sure it is a valid PNG generated by this app.
identity.enterContactName: Enter a name for this contact:

mimic.title: LSB Steganography Lab
mimic.description: Hide encrypted payloads inside innocuous images.
mimic.warningText: Uses LSB (Least Significant Bit) Steganography. Output images must be saved as PNG. Cloud compression (FB, Twitter, WhatsApp default) will destroy data.
mimic.encryptionComplete: Encryption complete. Please download the PNG.
mimic.dataFound: Data found! Switch to Vault to decrypt.
mimic.noDataFound: No valid data found or error reading image.
mimic.enterPayload: Enter text to hide in image...
mimic.payloadReady: PAYLOAD READY :: WAITING FOR CARRIER IMAGE
mimic.enterEmbedText: Please enter some text to embed first.

settings.title: System Configuration
settings.panicModePinDesc: Require PIN to exit camouflage mode
settings.emergencyWipeDesc: Destroy all local keys and cache immediately

tutorial.welcomeDesc: Your ultimate tool for secure communication and digital camouflage. Let's get you started!
tutorial.rsaAesDesc: Toggle between modes in the Vault panel to suit your needs.
tutorial.rsaAesTip: üí° Pro Tip: Use AES for your own files (Password protected). Use RSA to send secrets to friends (Identity Card required).
tutorial.stegoDesc: Hide your encrypted data inside normal-looking images! Upload an image, embed your secrets, and share the PNG. It looks like a photo, but it holds a secret.
tutorial.identityDesc: Create your unique Digital Identity Card. Share it with friends to exchange public keys securely. Import their cards to verify who they are.
